MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G60 postcode area of Old Kilpatrick. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown to check the cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:10pm on 26th January 2021.
